system.description: The character has extra limbs that can grab objects and attack foes.
system.effect: The character has an additional prehensile appendage (like a toil) or a symmetrical pair of them (like arms) that can be used to lift objects, use tools or otherwise take actions that normally require the use of a hand. This grants them an edge in Melee and Agility checks. A character can have as many additional limbs as they like-within reason-but they get no additional advantages for them.
